column1: Little Goat Diner////I came here for brunch (well
column2: technically breakfast as it was 8am) on a weekend. I was glad I went early. By the time we left around 9:15
column3: the line was out the door and a ton of people were waiting outside on a frosty day. As they don't accept reservations
column4: I guess it's go early or be prepared for the long wait in the cold.
